summary: Integration test suite that validates Conan's export-pkg command, covering creation of export folders, source handling, default settings, remote protection, JSON formatting, reference parsing, option processing, error conditions, partial references, environment profiling, transitive behavior without explicit settings, and inclusion of dependencies.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the package export workflow in Conan, so that developers can confidently create and distribute binary packages with proper handling of sources, settings, options, remote interactions, and error scenarios in CI/CD pipelines.
